parameters.name: CredentialConfig
parameters.description:
**If you have no special requirements, leave this parameter empty.**

The configurations of authorization chains. For more information, see [Use authorization chains to access resources of other entities](~~465340~~).

parameters.name: Notification
parameters.description:
The notification settings. For information about the asynchronous notification format, see [Asynchronous message examples](~~2743997~~).

>  The IMM operation does not support a callback URL. We recommend that you use Simple Message Queue (SMQ) to receive notifications.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password that protects the package. If the package is password-protected, you must provide the password to view the contents of the package.

parameters.name: SourceURI
parameters.description:
The URI of the package.

Specify the OSS URI in the oss://${Bucket}/${Object} format, where `${Bucket}` is the name of the bucket in the same region as the current project and `${Object}` is the path of the object with the extension included.

parameters.name: UserData
parameters.description: The custom information, which is returned in an asynchronous notification and facilitates notification management. The maximum length of the value is 2,048 bytes.
